subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The cunning of Bob Zuk led to the discovery and signing of Gary Carter in the spring of 1972, one of the greatest tales of espionage in the history of baseball scouting.
snippet: The cunning of Bob Zuk led to the discovery and signing of Gary Carter in the spring of 1972, one of the greatest tales of espionage in the history of baseball scouting.
